# stationary

**Type Property**

An event phase is in progress but hasn’t moved since the previous event.

## Declaration

```swift
static var stationary: NSEvent.Phase { get }
```

## Constants

- **began**: An event phase has begun.
- **changed**: An event phase has changed.
- **ended**: The event phase ended.
- **cancelled**: The system canceled the event phase.
- **mayBegin**: The system event phase may begin.

items.description: The system canceled the event phase.
items.name: cancelled

items.description: The system event phase may begin.

title: stationary
